title: Character Concept Zlashor :P
body:
Name: Zlashor
Zlashor is a creation of viktors. Viktor created a robot by harnessing the power of the void to power it. But it became corrupted. Viktor sealed it off and shut down all of his void powered projects. He labeled them as a failure. But Zlashor never shut off. Slowly the void corrupted him even more. Making him sentient. Angered with his creator he had a violent outburst and left the storage he was kept in. Now he roams  Valoran destroying all who stand in his path


Passive
Zlashor has 3 modes he can change inbetween with his q, each have benefits and loses
Attack Mode: bonus 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8/9/10% Ad but take 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8/9/10% Armour and Magic resist
Defence Mode: bonus 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8/9/10% armour and magic reset  but lose 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8/9/10% movement speed and attack speed
Speed mode: bonus 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8/9/10% movement speed and attack speed but lose 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5/4/4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8/9/10% ad



Q cooldown 10/5/3 seconds mana 5/10/20/40/50 mana
Switches Zlashors Mode (Attack, Defence, Agility)
Passively Zlashor Gains
2/3/5/6/8 percent cooldown reduction

W (seperate cooldown)  20/17/10/7/5 seconds (collective mana) 20/40/50/70/80
ATTACK mode
Fires out a linear skill shot that slows and provides a mark on target hit for 5 seconds, this can be detonated by Zlashor using His E  dealing 100/110/130/140/160 (+30% Bonus Ad)

Defence Mode
Shields target ally champion and gives them (5/10/15%) bonus armour/magic resist for 1/2/3/4/5 seconds

Speed
Zlashor dashes forward to target ally/enemy   Giving Zlashor a boost of (5/10/15/20/25%) bonus movement speed and attack speed

E (seperate cooldown) 20/15/10 seconds (collective mana)  30/45/50/65/80 
Attack Mode
(Only usable on marked targets)
Zlashor pulls all marked targets towards him with an explosion  and pulls the marked target towards him he hits them back dealing (50/70/100/120/150) (+30 % bonus ad) Ad Damage and slowing the target

Defence Mode 
Zlashor takes off 5/10/15 % of his current health and adds it as a shield to his ally. After 1/2/3/4/5 seconds all of the shield that's left comes back to Zlashor and gives back that amount of health.

Speed mode
Zlashor  Gains a Shield of his 1/2/3/4/5% max health  and speeds up all ally champions in his vision  and slows all enemies of his vision by 10/20/30/40/50%

R  (collective cooldown) 180/120/60 seconds (collective mana)  100/150/200 mana
Attack Mode
Zlashor fires in a big cone marking all enemy champions hit in the cone. His E's damage does 10/20/30% bonus damage to targets marked by his ultimate

Defence Mode
Zlashor Creates a shield wall  of void for 3/5/8 seconds Terrifying all enemies that pass through. Terrified enemies by this ability take 5/10/15% bonus damage from allies
Allies that pass through this wall get a shield of 1/3/5% of their max health (applicable once) for 1/3/5 seconds

Speed Mode
 Zlashor slows down for a second and channels all his speed in a sudden burst he releases all his speed energy giving his allies a bonus  10/20/30 % attack speed and movement speed boost and slowing nearby enemies by 10/30/50% slowed enemies take a bonus 5/10/15% damage from Zlashor

replies.body:
He does too much things, quite uneffectively. The different modes just redistribute stats by 10% which really isn't much, and the passive cooldown reduction would have to be seperate like sona's ult passive if it is to be viable. If his w doesn't do damage by itself he will be bullied heavily in the laning phase as it seems that he requires at least 2 abilities to do anything. Also, seperate cooldown suggests that he works similarly to Jayce, where his abilities in different modes are seperate. However, champions so far released with different mode have mode changing ability on their ult slot, as having 3 extra basic ability is strong enough to compensate for lack of an ultimate. However, your champion not only have 3 modes granting you 6 different basic abilities, and stat redistribution, he also has 3 different ultimate ability that your opponent has to deal with.

For him to be acceptable, his q will have to be R, and shift his other ability down and tone down his ultimate to a basic ability. Also, it would make it interesting, if the state redistribution was greater gained rather than equally lost and gained. For example. at level 18 changing his mode of offense should give him 25% damage for losing 15% armor and magic resists, or closely alike. as when you compare this with jayce, he recieves flat buffs when switching modes. Overall he is not uninteresting but he will need some more thought and work.
